feed.title: Stirling PDF Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for Stirling PDF: 0.23.0 Various updates and metadata and html handling fixes
entry.content:
This update is more about docker side and language updates than new major functionality but some good bug fixes etc!

Enhancements

  • PDF/A supports secondary PDF/A type
  • Able to hide/show app updates in a clearer manner (Check your settings.yml to enable!)
  • Lots of language updates! Thankyou all

Bug fixes

  • Correct handling and carrying over of PDF metadata
  • PDF to HTML reintroduced!
  • Username caps sensative fixes

What's Changed

  • Closes #359 by @DimK10 in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/1047
  • Update messages_de_DE.properties by @Ludy87 in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/1045
  • Update ja_JP,ko_KR,ru_RU,zh_TW.properties by @cocomastergo in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/1036
  • Feature: Add Ukrainian Language Support by @vadymkykalo in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/1039
  • fix: missing pdf to html endpoint by @sbplat in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/1043
  • add Ukrainian README, languages.html and correction FR, IT by @Ludy87 in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/1044
  • Improve Greek translation by @foivospro in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/1046
  • Ukrainian - add missing strings by @Ludy87 in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/1048
  • 359 split metadata lost by @DimK10 in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/1049
  • add sync-readme by @Ludy87 in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/1051
  • (Sonar) Fix "String#replace should be preferred to String#replaceAll" by @pixeebot in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/1056
  • replace comma to dot by @Ludy87 in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/1057
  • Update messages_it_IT.properties by @albanobattistella in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/1062
  • :memo: Update README: Translation Progress Table by @github-actions in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/1063
  • Fix: Resolve Username Case Sensitivity Issue in Login Flow by @Ludy87 in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/1070
  • Update messages_de_DE.properties by @diemade in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/1069
  • Cache form inputs between runs by @Frooodle in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/1066
  • :memo: Update README: Translation Progress Table by @github-actions in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/1091
  • Update messages_tr_TR.properties by @HNPorts in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/1092
  • :memo: Update README: Translation Progress Table by @github-actions in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/1093
  • Add selection for PDF/A output format by @phfuh in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/1095
  • Update messages_it_IT.properties by @albanobattistella in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/1096
  • UI: settings show/hide update display by @Ludy87 in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/1072
  • updating the build files by @Ludy87 in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/1100
  • Check DOCKER_ENABLE_SECURITY for UI by @Ludy87 in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/1103
  • German translation for Print Tool by @diemade in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/1104

  • Updated es_ES (100% completed) by @NeilJared in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/1106

  • :memo: Update README: Translation Progress Table by @github-actions in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/1107
  • print (WIP), fake scan (WIP) and text conversion for ultra-lite by @Frooodle in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/1098
  • :floppy_disk: Update Version by @github-actions in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/1108

New Contributors

  • @vadymkykalo made their first contribution in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/1039
  • @foivospro made their first contribution in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/1046
  • @diemade made their first contribution in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/1069

Full Changelog: https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/compare/v0.22.8...v0.23.0

entry.title: New release for Stirling PDF: 0.23.1 Custom HTML support
entry.content:
Features

  • Support for Custom HTML files is now live, set customHTMLFiles to true in settings.yml and place files in /customFiles/templates/
  • Language updates

Bug fixes

  • Login page now shows correct language
  • Disabling multi tool or pipeline now shows in UI correctly

What's Changed

  • Update CONTRIBUTING.md by @diemade in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/1115
  • Bugfix: Login page shows wrong selected country flag/language by @Ludy87 in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/1117
  • PDF to PDF/A language files by @phfuh in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/1118
  • :memo: Update README: Translation Progress Table by @github-actions in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/1119
  • Update messages_it_IT.properties by @albanobattistella in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/1120
  • Update messages_tr_TR.properties by @HNPorts in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/1126
  • commit by @Frooodle in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/1128
  • Custom HTML support #355 by @Frooodle in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/1129
  • :floppy_disk: Update Version by @github-actions in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/1130

Full Changelog: https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/compare/v0.23.0...v0.23.1

entry.title: New release for Stirling PDF: 0.24.0 OAuth2 and brand new UI!
entry.content:
Huge update today, the much awaited OAuth2 update, consider this feature beta as we iron out glitches for this feature. And a brand new UI redesign, I hope you all like it, please give feedback in discord, I will also be created a survey link in next release to hear input

Enhancements

Complete UI redesign!! (Thanks @Rectos28) OAuth2 Support! (Thanks @sahilph and @Ludy87 !) This is new feature so please consider it beta Arrow key movement support for Signing (thanks @t71rs) Various translations, thanks as always to everyone! custom_settings.yml file introduced, this means all custom java spring settings now go here, all Stirling-pdf settings remain in settings.yml Flattern now supporting flatterning text (converting inner content to image) Recommend JDK21 going forwards (although still support JDK17) Slovakian language added (thanks @p3lo )

Bug fixes

pdf to image not supporting chinese filenames #1035 noto fonts copying incorrectly #974 Drag drop files not working correctly (thanks @t71rs) Remove Redundant Back to Main Page Button in view page (thanks @urjeetpatel_

What's Changed

  • Handling Untranslatable Strings by @Ludy87 in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/1133
  • :memo: Update README: Translation Progress Table by @github-actions in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/1134
  • fix for #1035 by @Frooodle in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/1137
  • fonts noto fix #974 by @Frooodle in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/1139
  • Add OAUTH2 OIDC login support by @sahilph in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/1140
  • Update 3rd Party Licenses by @github-actions in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/1144
  • Add translations for OAUTH2 Related Text by @sahilph in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/1146
  • Arrow key support signing by @t71rs in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/1143
  • Update messages_de_DE.properties by @Ludy87 in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/1149
  • Update messages_it_IT.properties by @albanobattistella in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/1148
  • :memo: Update README: Translation Progress Table by @github-actions in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/1151
  • Change User Roles by @sahilph in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/1153
  • :memo: Update README: Translation Progress Table by @github-actions in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/1155
  • Drag&drop bug by @t71rs in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/1157
  • introduces custom settings file by @Frooodle in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/1158
  • lets try this again (Config fix) by @Frooodle in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/1159
  • Update messages_it_IT.properties by @albanobattistella in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/1165
  • flatten by @Frooodle in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/1167

  • 1166 update rhefs by @Frooodle in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/1169

  • :memo: Update README: Translation Progress Table by @github-actions in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/1168
  • Redesign using MD3 system by @Rectos28 in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/1170
  • Timeouts #1094 by @Frooodle in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/1171
  • :floppy_disk: Update Version by @github-actions in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/1172
  • Update messages_it_IT.properties by @albanobattistella in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/1177
  • Introduced protections against HTTP header injection / smuggling attacks by @pixeebot in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/1179
  • Update README.md: minor spelling fix by @subarudad in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/1180
  • Updated/improved Bulgarian language strings. Thank you. by @nimdassdev in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/1191
  • Install locally on a machine with no-root, docker, apt, yum, and apk via nix package manager. by @bluestero in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/1188
  • :memo: Update README: Translation Progress Table by @github-actions in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/1192

  • Redesign by @Frooodle in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/1193
  • extends the functionality of oauth in Stirling PDF by @Ludy87 in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/1201

  • adds all available settings to settings.yml by @Ludy87 in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/1225
  • bg-card will be added to the class and password/username validation by @Ludy87 in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/1226

New Contributors

quick fix for caching so users can put up new changes!
